name: GSI Soft Sided Wine Carafe
description: Transport your favourite vintage safely and easily into the backcountry or the backyard.Two stage cap with a wide mouth for filling from bottles and a smaller opening for spill-free pouring.Stylish, tapered silhouette with cork embellishment and foiled exterior complements any patio, picnic table, or forest floor.Rewriteable data bar for recording varietal, vintage, vintner, and uncorking date.750ml capacity.
